short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a Chrome extension that lets one ask for DNS for any website or URL and includes the possibility to choose from diverseâ€¦

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a Chrome extension that lets one ask for DNS for any website or URL and includes the possibility to choose from diverse individual record types to be received. Such record types include A records, NS (Name Server) records, CNAME (Canonical Name) records, SOA (Start of Authority) records, MX (Mail Exchange) records, TXT records, AAAA records for IPv6 addresses, and SRV (Service) records.
